name: Night Shift (itch) (ViolenceInVideoGames)
description:
A text based adventure while you work the night shift at a gas station during a storm.

CONTROLS

Press Enter to bring up the text box and input text commands.

Use only two words such as "Take Box" or "Talk Customer"

If you are in a conversation with a customer then you can leave that conversation by typing "Leave Conversation"

Press Enter again to input the text command.

Click on the screen to move, if the location isn't blocked you're character will travel to that location.

OBJECTIVE

Explore the station and talk with the people to learn about their personalities and uncover any possible secrets  about them. Perform your daily tasks and finish your shift. 

STORY

You work the night shift at this corner gas station. A strange storm has brought in some odd customers and some various power issues and possible dangers. Finish your shift so you can go home safely.

NOTES & ISSUES

We wanted to add  various ways to be killed but those have yet to be implemented.  There are a few glitches in the drawing order and pathfinding. We haven't added the customer opinion meter and the ability to discover all of the secrets have yet to be added. However you can complete the game and that is why we uploaded it. Eventually we will return to address these issues. Thank you for checking out Night Shift.
